channel.title: Home on Raphaël Gass
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Raphaël Gass

item.title: Articles
item.description: Submitted journal papers An Advanced 1D Physics-Based Model for PEM Hydrogen Fuel Cells With Enhanced Overvoltage Prediction In the Journal of Power Sources or in HAL (preprint). Published journal papers 2024 A Critical Review of Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cells Matter Transports and Voltage Polarisation for Modelling In the Journal of the Electrochemical Society or in HAL (postprint).

item.title: Raphaël Gass Biography
item.description: 2021-2024: PhD in automatics at Aix-Marseille university in LIS laboratory and at Franche-Comté University at Femto-st within the FCLab. Thesis subject: Développement d’un modèle multi échelle et dégradé de la pile à combustible PEMFC, avec diagnostic de son état de dégradation et pronostic de sa durée de vie restante, pour des applications d’automatique. 2018-2021: Master degree in general engineering, with a double master degree in process engineering at Mines Saint-Etienne, from Mines-Telecom Institute (France).
